S08n680:1: athakhalu bhagavāṃ śākyamuniḥ punarapi śuddhāvāsabhavanamavalokya mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtamāmantrayate sma |
S08n680:2: śṛṇu tvaṃ mañjuśrīḥ ! pañcamamudrāpaṭalavisaraṃ tvadīyaṃ sarvatathāgatadharmakośānupraviṣṭaṃ paramaguhyatamaṃ dharmadhātvasaṃkhyeyācintyamudrāmudritaṃ sarvamantracaryānupraviṣṭaṃ paramarahasyatamaṃ sarvalokottarotkṛṣṭatamaṃ sarvalaukikānucaritāṃ modyatamaṃ katamaṃ ca tad bhāṣiṣye'ham |
S08n680:4: atha mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ punarapi utthāyāsanād bhagavataḥ caraṇayornipatya bhagavantametadavocat |
S08n680:5: tat sādhu bhagavāṃ deśayatu sarvamantracaryānupraviṣṭāṃ sarvasattvānāmarthāya asmākaṃ cānukampāmupādāya mahāpraṇidhānamahānirhāramahābodhimaṇḍopasaṅkramaṇacaryāparipūraṇatāya pañcamaṃ mahāmudrāpaṭalavisaraṃ saṃkṣepataḥ pañca caiva mahāmudrāḥ |
S08n680:6: aparyantā ca sthitamudrāṃ āhvānanavisarjanasarvakarmārthasarvamanorathamāśāpāripūraṇatāyai sarvamantratantramahāmudrānupraveśanatāyai sarvasattvasantoṣaṇamahāsamayasarvamudrānupraveśanatāyai yasyedānīṃ kālaṃ manyaśceti ||
S08n680:12: dṛṣṭvā āgatāṃ sattvā vavre vāṇī ṛṣisattamaḥ ||
S08n680:13: śākyakulajo dakṣaḥ mudrāṃ deśe tu tatkṣaṇāt |
S08n680:14: yaṃ baddhvā puruṣā prājñā niyataṃ bodhiparāyaṇāḥ ||
S08n680:15: sarvamantrāśca siddheyu saugatā ye ca laukikā |
S08n680:16: pañca caiva mahāmudrā baddhā munivaraiḥ purā ||
S08n680:20: kanyasau saṃsparśayed dhīmāṃ ubhā aṅguṣṭha ucchraye ||
S08n680:23: sarvathā sādhitā devī pūrṇeti ca gīyate |
S08n680:24: tadeva hastau bhrāmayitvā tu nābhideśe tu saṃnyaset ||
S08n680:25: āśāsampādinī kṣipraṃ mahāpuṇyā hitā hi sā |
S08n680:28: uraḥ sthāne sadā nyasyā tṛtīyā bhavati sunirmalā ||
S08n680:29: caturthī tu bhavet sā tu śiraḥsthāne sumudrayā |
S08n680:30: pañcamī tu bhave jyeṣṭhā muktā sarvagatāṃ nu guṇān ||
S08n680:31: lokadhātrī tu sā jñeyā prasiddhā sarvakarmasu |
S08n680:34: vikṣiptairvisarjanaṃ kuryāt manasā mokṣa eva tu ||
S08n680:36: āryamañjuśriyamūlakalpāt bodhisattvapiṭakāvataṃsakāt mahāyānavaipulyasūtrāt catuḥcatvāriṃśatimaḥ mahāmudrāpaṭalavisaraḥ parisamāpta iti |
